properties.title: Berggasthaus Tälli
properties.description: The Tällihütte at the foot of the "Gadmer Dolomiten" is a mountain guesthouse easily accessible by cable car. In the summer half-year it offers 37 sleeping places in different room sizes. It is the starting point for the Tälli via ferrata and hikes in the southern flank of the Gadmer valley or to Engstlenalp in the Gental.
